member.name: T:DijkstraAlgorhitm.AdjacencyDictionary
member.summary: mathes every node to adjacent nodes with edges weights to them. For example from node U to V1, V2, ..., Vn with edges weights (from U to V1, V2, ..., Vn)

member.name: P:DijkstraAlgorhitm.AdjacencyDictionary.AdjDictionary
member.summary: keys is nodes of graph it mathes to values which are lists of all adjacent nodes with weights to them

member.name: M:DijkstraAlgorhitm.AdjacencyDictionary.AddNode(System.String)
member.returns: new node with name of parameter

member.name: M:DijkstraAlgorhitm.AdjacencyDictionary.AddEdge(DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode,DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode,System.Int32)
member.summary: addition edge to source node as pair destination node and weitght to it

member.name: M:DijkstraAlgorhitm.AdjacencyDictionary.GetVertices
member.returns: all the keys that are the vertices of the graph

member.name: P:DijkstraAlgorhitm.AdjacencyDictionary.Item(DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode)
member.param: the node the list of which we want to get
member.returns: List of adjacent nodes with edges weights to them

member.name: M:DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraAlgorhitm.Execute(DijkstraAlgorhitm.Graph,DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode)
member.param: the node from which we look for the shortest paths
member.returns: graph with filled "distances" and "prevs" of every node

member.name: M:DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraAlgorhitm.Relax(DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode,DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode,System.Int32,DijkstraAlgorhitm.PriorityQueue{DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode})
member.summary: find shortest distance to vertice v between known distance (v.Distance) and from u across edge (u, v)
member.param: weith of edge between u and v

member.name: T:DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode
member.summary: implements vertice of graph also stores elements of Dijkstra algorithm (distance and prev)

member.name: P:DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode.Distance
member.summary: distance from source node. int.MaxValue by default

member.name: T:DijkstraAlgorhitm.Graph
member.summary: implements a graph structure as AdjacencyDictionary

member.name: P:DijkstraAlgorhitm.Graph.AdjDict
member.summary: stores nodes of graph and adjacent nodes with edges weights to them

member.name: M:DijkstraAlgorhitm.GraphExtensions.FindDijkstraShortestPathsFrom(DijkstraAlgorhitm.Graph,DijkstraAlgorhitm.DijkstraNode)
member.summary: simplification: call Dijkstra algorithm from instance of Graph
member.returns: graph with filled "distances" and "prevs" of every node
